type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.platform.NativePlatform

method.name: architecture
method.description:
Sets the cpu architecture being targeted.

The architecture is provided as a string name, which is translated into one of the supported architecture types.

@see Architecture Supported notations.

method.name: getArchitecture
method.description: The cpu architecture being targeted. Defaults to the default architecture produced by the tool chain.

method.name: getOperatingSystem
method.description: The operating system being targeted. Defaults to the default operating system targeted by the tool chain (normally the current operating system).

method.name: operatingSystem
method.description:
Sets the operating system being targeted.

The operating system is provided as a string name, which is translated into one of the supported operating system types.

@see OperatingSystem Supported notations.

property.name: architecture
property.description: The cpu architecture being targeted. Defaults to the default architecture produced by the tool chain.

property.name: operatingSystem
property.description: The operating system being targeted. Defaults to the default operating system targeted by the tool chain (normally the current operating system).
